long_description: The ECOXGEAR ECOXBT speaker system brings together wireless and rechargeable convenience, a floating and waterproof design, and rugged and shock-resistant durability with rich, full-range sound. Dual 2 in. speakers crank out clear, dynamic sound. Easily stream and play music from an Bluetooth(R)-enabled smartphone or other audio device-and answer phone calls over the built-in microphone. An auxiliary-in jack on the back of the speaker provides the option of directly linking an audio device with a standard 3.5mm connection. Polycarbonate outer shell with a rubber overmold provides waterproofness, flotation and shock-resistant durability. Top panel features controls for power, Bluetooth, volume and speaker phone; LED indicators show statuses for power, Bluetooth pairing and recharging. Rechargeable lithium battery provides over 10 hrs. of playtime at a medium volume setting; battery recharges fully in approximately 2 hrs. The ECOXGEAR ECOXBT speaker system comes with a USB cord, USB-to-AC power adapter and a carabiner clip.
